Referendum: 6 November 1999									
		
Referendum Results										
	
By Division by Polling Place									
		

"A proposed law for the Alteration of the Constitution, entitled"			
								
   the Constitutional Alteration (Establishment of Republic) 1999			
								
											
											
South Australia
